definition: branch/stem/stalk/CL:根[gen1]/to block/to hinder/(Tw) interesting, fresh, or amusing subject matter or scenario
Serbia/Serbian/abbr. for 塞爾維亞|塞尔维亚[Sai1 er3 wei2 ya4]
to stop up/to squeeze in/to stuff/cork/stopper
to stop up/to stuff/to cope with

sentences.english: It is useful to prevent infarcted hemorrhage for the patients with brain infarction from his recovery.
sentences.chinese: 說明預防腦梗塞後出血對改善患者預後具有重要意義。

sentences.english: The infraction of the corresponding cerebral areas undergoing temporary arterial occlusion occurred in 3 patients.
sentences.chinese: 被阻斷動脈供血區出現腦梗塞者3例。

sentences.english: Conclusion MR is bettler than CT in the lesion of cerebellum infarction.
sentences.chinese: 結論小腦梗塞性病變MR檢查優於CT檢查。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the mechanism and the cure manner in acute cerebral infarction.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討急性腦梗塞的發病機制及治療措施。

sentences.english: Conclusions Establishment of cerebral infarction model by gelfoam embolization is practical.
sentences.chinese: 結論用明膠海綿栓塞頸內動脈製作腦梗塞模型可行。

sentences.english: There are recent curative efficacy on the patients with acute cerebral infarction with hyperhematocrit.
sentences.chinese: 證明紅細胞單採對急性腦梗塞患者近期療效肯定。

sentences.english: An investigation of 115 patients with hypertensive cerebral infarcts was performed.
sentences.chinese: 報道115例高血壓病患者合併腦梗塞的臨牀特點。

sentences.english: Cerebral infarction; Fleabane injection; Clinical study.
sentences.chinese: 腦梗塞，燈盞花注射液，臨牀研究。

sentences.english: What doctor told coco is guide the acute cerebral infarction.
sentences.chinese: 醫生告訴可可何導得的是急性腦梗塞。

sentences.english: FLAIR should become a conventional sequence in the diagnosis of cerebral infarction.
sentences.chinese: FLAIR序列應該成爲診斷腦梗塞的常規序列。

sentences.english: Objective To study the correlation between lacunar cerebral infarction and cerebral arterial stenosis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討腔隙性腦梗塞與顱內腦動脈狹窄的關係。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate effect of batroxobin for progressive cerebral infarction.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察巴曲酶在進展性腦梗塞中的治療作用。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the effect factors of intelligence impairment in cerebral infarct patients.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討影響腦梗塞後智能障礙的因素。

sentences.english: Infarction is the most common cause of secondary intracerebral hemorrhage.
sentences.chinese: 腦梗塞是繼發性顱內出血最常見的誘因。

sentences.english: Objective We analysis the clinical significance of lacuna encephalon infarction.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析腔隙性腦梗塞在臨牀中的表現。

sentences.english: Acutobin injection is safe and effective medicine for treatment of acute cerebral infarction.
sentences.chinese: 蘄蛇酶注射液爲治療急性腦梗塞安全有效的藥物。
